altername_name: フォーメーションサッカー
name: Formation Soccer: Human Cup '90
overview: The first of the Formation Soccer games from Human Entertainment. Formation Soccer Human Cup '90, uses a vertical-scrolling view of the pitch. The game was designed and released to coincide with the 1990 World Cup event set in Italy. It features sixteen teams, though only eleven of those actually qualified for the World Cup. The player can choose between a single game Exhibition mode and a tournament "Human Cup" mode to choose between.
